title: MASS PRIDE
desc: Watercolor painting 6 birds perched on branches creating the colors of the stripes progress pride flag. The background is blue box with a yellow and white glow at the top and a pink square around it. A small purple circle intercepting it at the top. The birds are, from left to write: a purple martin, a blue jay, a mourning warbler, an american goldfinch, an oriole, and a cardinal.

title: Crocus
desc: Watercolor painting of 3 crocus blooming.

title: Sus
desc: Watercolor painting of an white, black, and purple ink cap mushroom giving the side eye suspiciously with their arms crossed.

title: Shelter to Wonder
desc: Watercolor painting of a blue green and white spotted verdigris agaric mushroom protecting it's little mushroom offspring from the rain as it watches the weather in wonder.

title: Relaxing
desc: Watercolor painting of a red hot milk cap mushroom reclining and just relaxing.

title: Joy
desc: Watercolor painting of a pale brown king oyster mushroom jumping for joy.

title: In a Huff
desc: Watercolor painting of a sharp scaly pholiota mushroom with their arms crossed looking angry or pouting.

title: Spring Cardinal
desc: Watercolor painting of an cardinal sitting in gray tree banches with budding red leaves.

title: Sunset Wyvern
desc: Watercolor painting of a peacock bass with a fly-fishing fly in it's mouth on a taught flyline half submerged swimming in the water.

title: Peacock Bass
desc: Watercolor painting of a peacock bass with a fly-fishing fly in it's mouth on a taught flyline half submerged swimming in the water.

desc: Micron pen scene of a sea dragon, inspired by the Galapagos marine iguana, climbing a rock spire.

desc: Micron pen drawing of a Red Panda with it's front paws on a fountain made of 6 leaves.

title: Jason and Colin
desc: Micron pen line art for fan art I'm working on of He Who Fights With Monsters of characters Jason and Colin. Jason is holding a lemonade and about to step of a ledge, Colin is a pile of leeches following behind him.

title: Raven Queen
desc: Digital portrait of the Raven Queen from A Practical Guide to Sorcery, holding feathers with feathers falling around her and her shadow shows a raven demon. Below her knees she dissolves into feathers.

title: Page of Pentacles
desc: Watercolor painting of a white-throated magpie jay on a branch holding a gold chain with a large pentacle charm. The background is pink and pink-gray color blocked in thick stripes.

title: Sunshine
desc: Linocut print of a American Goldfinch sitting on a sunflower with a sun in a blue sky behind it.

title: Seabirds
desc: Linocut and gelli print of a seabirds over water.

title: Jellyfish
desc: Linocut and gelli plate prints of jellyfish, some over abstract watercolor backgrounds.

title: Bitter Dreams
desc: Linocut and gelli plate prints of jellyfish and birds, some over abstract watercolor backgrounds, conveying the idea of dreams and how when reached they sometimes aren't what they were anticipated to be.

title: Two of Pentacles
desc: watercolor and ink painting crow flying holding a white ribbon with two jingle bells over a red, orange, and yellow background.

title: 2024 Pride - Miko
desc: Digital portrait of Miko the Shiba Inu wearing a hat and bandana featuring the progress pride flag colors, celebrating 2024 pride month!

title: Queen of Wands
desc: A blond woman in a white dress steps over the root of a large tree with red shelf mushrooms growing on it deep in the forest as light filters through the leaves. In one hand is a shepherds crook, the other arm is lifted and an owlet is perched on it looking at her. Done in micron pen and watercolor.

title: Kingfisher
desc: Watercolor painting of a kingfisher sitting on a branch over with a bird in its beak with a blue sky behind it.

title: Clark, Destroyer of Gardens
desc: Watercolor painting of a demonic looking jackalope with dead plants. This card is also my 5 of pentacles representing devastation, just like the rabbits in my yard do to my poor garden.

title: Salmon Run
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a bear carrying off a fish from a fish filled stream in Alaska with 9 sea stars. In the background is a misty forest.

title: Eight of Cups
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a Japanese River Otter on a fallen log with shelf fungi on it over a river.

title: Dhole Party
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of three dholes playing near a stream with 3 pools of water with a dry grassy field behind them.

title: Pancakes with Henry
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a boy sitting on a kitchen chair eating pancakes with a multi-eyed, multi-mouthed, tentacled dark purple eldritch horror lit by a staff with a lantern on it.

title: Himalayan Brown Bear
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a Himalayan Brown Bear sitting on a pile of rocks with the sunset in the background.

desc: Black and brown micron pen drawing of a bat hanging off a branch buy the legs and 1 finger looking at the viewer.

title: Forest Owlet
desc: A blond woman in a white dress steps over the root of a large tree deep in the forest as light filters through the leaves. In one hand is a shepherds crook, the other arm is lifted and an owlet is perched on it looking at her. Done in micron pen and watercolor.

desc: Micron pen line art of an egyptian lion with a sylized sun behind him and a gradient that fills the sun and the lion going from yellow to sienna brown.

title: Zebra Duiker
desc: A zebra duiker running across a grassland with a sunset behind it with a duiker skeleton visble underground. The half sun and dark areas in the ground create a full circle.

title: Red Squirrel
desc: A red squirrel with a fluffy tail looks up at the viewer, shocked.

title: Pinto's Spinetail

desc: Line art of a panay monitor lizard sitting on a branch facing left staring at the viewer.

desc: The sea fades into the sky with no defined horizon line, the only thing visible is a fuzzy silhouette of a bird flying in the distance.
